duties_responsibilities.duty: Supporting Store Manager and Assistant Store Manager with achieving retail store targets by driving sales
Opening and closing the store in the absence of any other management and ensuring the store trades safely and legally
Delivering sales through friendly and efficient customer service
Ensuring customers have a fun and enjoyable shopping experience
Assisting customers with product knowledge and queries
Assisting with store deliveries, visual merchandising, stock takes, markdowns, promotions, and ear piercing
